Mueller","details":"Auction inherits Initializable to ensure Auction is only initialized once","methods":{"getAsset()":{"details":"Used in frontend to show asset details to both seller and bidders","return":"number and contract address of tokens being auctioned"},"getBidderDeposit()":{"details":"Used in frontend to show bidder deposit requirement to both seller and bidders","return":"amount of ETH bidders are required to deposit in order to commit bid"},"getBidders()":{"details":"Used in frontend to show bidders to seller","return":"array of bidder addresses"},"getEscrow()":{"details":"Used in frontend to obtain escrow contract address for seller and winner","return":"address of deployed Escrow contract"},"getPhase()":{"details":"Used in frontend to show phase to both seller and bidders","return":"string representation of current phase"},"getSaltedHash(bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Used in frontend in Commit phase and internally in Reveal phase","params":{"data":"32-byte hex encoding of bid amount (left zero-padded on front end)","salt":"32-byte hex encoding of bidder password (from front end)"},"return":"bytes32 keccak hash of salted bid"},"getSellerDeposit()":{"details":"Used in frontend to show seller deposit amount to both seller and bidders","return":"amount of ETH seller has deposited"},"getWinner()":{"details":"Used in frontend to show winning bidder and bid to both seller and bidders","return":"winner address and bid (in ETH)"},"initialize(address,uint256,address)":{"details":"Initializable contracts have initialize function instead of constructorinitializer modifier prevents function from being called twice","params":{"_seller":"address of seller triggering Auction deploy","_tokenAmount":"uint number of tokens being auctioned, assumed 18 decimal precision","_tokenContractAddress":"contract address of token being auction, assumed ERC-20"}},"receiveSellerDeposit()":{"details":"Frontend handles seller transferSeller can submit (and change) sellerDeposit multiple times, which should be controlled for (e.g. multiple deposits)"},"revealBid(bytes32,bytes32)":{"params":{"bidHex":"32-byte hex encoding of bid amount (left zero-padded on front end)","salt":"32-byte hex encoding of bidder password (from front end)"}},"setupBidders(uint256,address[])":{"details":"Seller can call this multiple times, should establish logic to prevent or to handle editing bidder setup","params":{"_bidderAddresses":"array of bidders to invite (seller configures on front end)","_bidderDeposit":"bidder deposit requirement amount (seller configures on front end when inviting bidders)"}},"startCommit()":{"details":"Frontend listens for phase change logs to update UI"},"startWithdraw()":{"details":"Could update to use minimal proxy pattern to deploy escrow with less gas"},"submitBid(bytes32)":{"details":"Bidder can submit (and change) bid multiple times, which should be controlled for (e.g. multiple deposits)","params":{"dataHash":"32-byte keccak256 hash of bid commit amount and salt (return value of getSaltedHash above called from front end)"}},"withdrawBidderDeposit()":{"details":"Performs state updates before external call to prevent reentrancy attackTo test / control for: effects of multiple and changing deposits by same bidder"},"withdrawSellerDeposit()":{"details":"Performs state updates before external call to prevent reentrancy attackTo test / control for: effects of multiple and changing seller deposits"}},"title":"Gloom - contracts to auction off ERC-20 tokens to the highest bidder (in ETH)Auction contract, to be used in conjunction with AuctionFactory and Escrow contracts"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"getAsset()":{"notice":"Get details of token being auctioned at any contract at any time"},"getPhase()":{"notice":"Get current Auction phase"},"getSaltedHash(bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Get salt and hash of bid"},"getSellerDeposit()":{"notice":"Get seller deposit amount at any time"},"getWinner()":{"notice":"Get winning bidder address and bid at any time, will have results from Deliver phase"},"initialize(address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Initialize Auction in Setup phase with seller address and ERC-20 token amount and address"},"receiveSellerDeposit()":{"notice":"Receives seller deposit (in ETH) in Setup phase"},"revealBid(bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Checks revealed bid in Reveal phase to ensure it matches commit, if so stores revealed bid"},"setupBidders(uint256,address[])":{"notice":"Seller establishes bidder deposit requirement and invite bidders in Setup phase"},"startCommit()":{"notice":"Start commit"},"startDeliver()":{"notice":"Start delivery, determine winner, deploy new escrow devdoc.author: Michael S. Mueller
devdoc.details: Auction inherits Initializable to ensure Auction is only initialized once

getAsset().details: Used in frontend to show asset details to both seller and bidders
getAsset().return: number and contract address of tokens being auctioned

getBidderDeposit().details: Used in frontend to show bidder deposit requirement to both seller and bidders
getBidderDeposit().return: amount of ETH bidders are required to deposit in order to commit bid

getBidders().details: Used in frontend to show bidders to seller

getEscrow().details: Used in frontend to obtain escrow contract address for seller and winner

getPhase().details: Used in frontend to show phase to both seller and bidders

getSaltedHash(bytes32,bytes32).details: Used in frontend in Commit phase and internally in Reveal phase

params.data: 32-byte hex encoding of bid amount (left zero-padded on front end)
params.salt: 32-byte hex encoding of bidder password (from front end)

getSaltedHash(bytes32,bytes32).return: bytes32 keccak hash of salted bid

getSellerDeposit().details: Used in frontend to show seller deposit amount to both seller and bidders
getSellerDeposit().return: amount of ETH seller has deposited

getWinner().details: Used in frontend to show winning bidder and bid to both seller and bidders

initialize(address,uint256,address).details: Initializable contracts have initialize function instead of constructorinitializer modifier prevents function from being called twice

params._seller: address of seller triggering Auction deploy
params._tokenAmount: uint number of tokens being auctioned, assumed 18 decimal precision
params._tokenContractAddress: contract address of token being auction, assumed ERC-20

receiveSellerDeposit().details: Frontend handles seller transferSeller can submit (and change) sellerDeposit multiple times, which should be controlled for (e.g. multiple deposits)

params.bidHex: 32-byte hex encoding of bid amount (left zero-padded on front end)
params.salt: 32-byte hex encoding of bidder password (from front end)

setupBidders(uint256,address[]).details: Seller can call this multiple times, should establish logic to prevent or to handle editing bidder setup

params._bidderAddresses: array of bidders to invite (seller configures on front end)
params._bidderDeposit: bidder deposit requirement amount (seller configures on front end when inviting bidders)

startCommit().details: Frontend listens for phase change logs to update UI

startWithdraw().details: Could update to use minimal proxy pattern to deploy escrow with less gas

submitBid(bytes32).details: Bidder can submit (and change) bid multiple times, which should be controlled for (e.g. multiple deposits)

params.dataHash: 32-byte keccak256 hash of bid commit amount and salt (return value of getSaltedHash above called from front end)

withdrawBidderDeposit().details: Performs state updates before external call to prevent reentrancy attackTo test / control for: effects of multiple and changing deposits by same bidder

withdrawSellerDeposit().details: Performs state updates before external call to prevent reentrancy attackTo test / control for: effects of multiple and changing seller deposits

devdoc.title: Gloom - contracts to auction off ERC-20 tokens to the highest bidder (in ETH)Auction contract, to be used in conjunction with AuctionFactory and Escrow contracts

getAsset().notice: Get details of token being auctioned at any time

getBidderDeposit().notice: Get bidder deposit requirement amount at any time

getEscrow().notice: Get address of deployed Escrow contract at any time

getSaltedHash(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Get salt and hash of bid

getSellerDeposit().notice: Get seller deposit amount at any time

getWinner().notice: Get winning bidder address and bid at any time, will have results from Deliver phase

initialize(address,uint256,address).notice: Initialize Auction in Setup phase with seller address and ERC-20 token amount and address

receiveSellerDeposit().notice: Receives seller deposit (in ETH) in Setup phase

revealBid(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Checks revealed bid in Reveal phase to ensure it matches commit, if so stores revealed bid

setupBidders(uint256,address[]).notice: Seller establishes bidder deposit requirement and invite bidders in Setup phase

startDeliver().notice: Start delivery, determine winner, deploy new escrow contract

startWithdraw().notice: Check that seller has transferred tokens and buyer has paid, then start withdraw

submitBid(bytes32).notice: Triggers bidder deposit (in ETH) and commits obfuscated bid in Commit phase

withdrawBidderDeposit().notice: Bidder withdraws deposit (in ETH) in withdraw phase

withdrawSellerDeposit().notice: Seller withdraws deposit (in ETH) in withdraw phase

userdoc.notice: This MVP is designed to handle one auction or one auction invite per addressThis is a demo, do not use on mainnet
